name: Battle of the Broadsword
description:
Battle of the BroadSword: A unique fighting game featuring high-risk, high-reward gameplay. Counter enemy attacks and turn the tide of battle with a variety of different stances. Play against the AI or against your friends in Local Versus. Easy to pick up and play, yet difficult to conquer.

Heart-pounding soundtrack, diverse selection of environments, and an awesome cast of characters highlight the combat that makes Battle of the BroadSword a unique addition to the fighting game genre.

MasonDogg Studios
